casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Patterson, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Patterson (1996), 75 Ohio St.3d 413.]

(No. 95-2339 Submitted February 20, 1996 Decided April 10, 1996.) *414Anthony G. Pizza, Lucas County Prosecuting Attorney, and Craig T. Pearson, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Larry Patterson, pro se. Per Curiam.

We affirm the decision of the court of appeals for the reason stated in its decision.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Wright, J., not participating.
